text:
This patch adds the function hashPassword() to the DocumentProperties class in HWPF. The hash generated by this function can be used to set the lKeyProtDoc field or to compare its value against a user provided password.

This patch comes with a test case.
creator: stefan.kopf@alfresco.com
stefan.kopf@alfresco.com
text:
Created attachment 31258
Patch file created by patch.xml to add password hash function to HWPF

creator: kiwiwings@apache.org
